CustomField.description: Used to split a dashboard report in half by account because there were too many values.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( BEGINS(Services_Partner__r.Name, "A"), BEGINS(Services_Partner__r.Name, "B"), BEGINS(Services_Partner__r.Name, "C"), BEGINS(Services_Partner__r.Name, "D"), BEGINS(Services_Partner__r.Name, "E"), BEGINS(Services_Partner__r.Name, "F"), BEGINS(Services_Partner__r.Name, "G"), BEGINS(Services_Partner__r.Name, "H") ), "First Half of Alphabet", "Second Half of Alphabet" )
CustomField.label: Services Partner First Letter
